description: Returns information about DB cluster snapshots. This API action supports pagination. For more information on Amazon Aurora DB clusters, see What is Amazon Aurora? in the Amazon Aurora User Guide. For more information on Multi-AZ DB clusters, see Multi-AZ DB cluster deployments in the Amazon RDS User Guide.

parameters.name: DBClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the DB cluster to retrieve the list of DB cluster snapshots for. This parameter can't be used in conjunction with the DBClusterSnapshotIdentifier parameter. This parameter isn't case-sensitive. Constraints: If supplied, must match the identifier of an existing DBCluster.

parameters.name: DBClusterSnapshotIdentifier
parameters.description: A specific DB cluster snapshot identifier to describe. This parameter can't be used in conjunction with the DBClusterIdentifier parameter. This value is stored as a lowercase string. Constraints: If supplied, must match the identifier of an existing DBClusterSnapshot. If this identifier is for an automated snapshot, the SnapshotType parameter must also be specified.

parameters.name: SnapshotType
parameters.description: The type of DB cluster snapshots to be returned. You can specify one of the following values: automated - Return all DB cluster snapshots that have been automatically taken by Amazon RDS for my Amazon Web Services account. manual - Return all DB cluster snapshots that have been taken by my Amazon Web Services account. shared - Return all manual DB cluster snapshots that have been shared to my Amazon Web Services account. public - Return all DB cluster snapshots that have been marked as public. If you don't specify a SnapshotType value, then both automated and manual DB cluster snapshots are returned. You can include shared DB cluster snapshots with these results by enabling the IncludeShared parameter. You can include public DB cluster snapshots with these results by enabling the IncludePublic parameter. The IncludeShared and IncludePublic parameters don't apply for SnapshotType values of manual or automated. The IncludePublic parameter doesn't apply when SnapshotType is set to shared. The IncludeShared parameter doesn't apply when SnapshotType is set to public.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A filter that specifies one or more DB cluster snapshots to describe. Supported filters: db-cluster-id - Accepts DB cluster identifiers and DB cluster Amazon Resource Names (ARNs). db-cluster-snapshot-id - Accepts DB cluster snapshot identifiers. snapshot-type - Accepts types of DB cluster snapshots. engine - Accepts names of database engines. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs. The filters supported by a describe operation are documented with the describe operation. The following actions can be filtered: DescribeDBClusterBacktracks DescribeDBClusterEndpoints DescribeDBClusters DescribeDBInstances DescribeDBRecommendations DescribeDBShardGroups DescribePendingMaintenanceActions The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. One or more filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so you can retrieve the remaining results. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

parameters.name: IncludeShared
parameters.description: Specifies whether to include shared manual DB cluster snapshots from other Amazon Web Services accounts that this Amazon Web Services account has been given permission to copy or restore. By default, these snapshots are not included. You can give an Amazon Web Services account permission to restore a manual DB cluster snapshot from another Amazon Web Services account by the ModifyDBClusterSnapshotAttribute API action.

parameters.name: IncludePublic
parameters.description: Specifies whether to include manual DB cluster snapshots that are public and can be copied or restored by any Amazon Web Services account. By default, the public snapshots are not included. You can share a manual DB cluster snapshot as public by using the  ModifyDBClusterSnapshotAttribute API action.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous DescribeDBClusterSnapshots request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: DBClusterSnapshots
nested_items.description: Provides a list of DB cluster snapshots for the user.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: The list of Availability Zones (AZs) where instances in the DB cluster snapshot can be restored.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DBClusterSnapshotIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier for the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: DBClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The DB cluster identifier of the DB cluster that this DB cluster snapshot was created from.

nested_items.name: SnapshotCreateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the snapshot was taken, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The name of the database engine for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: EngineMode
nested_items.description: The engine mode of the database engine for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: AllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The allocated storage size of the DB cluster snapshot in gibibytes (GiB).

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of this DB cluster snapshot. Valid statuses are the following:
available.
copying.
creating.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port that the DB cluster was listening on at the time of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The VPC ID associated with the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: ClusterCreateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the DB cluster was created, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: MasterUsername
nested_items.description: The master username for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the database engine for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: LicenseModel
nested_items.description: The license model information for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: SnapshotType
nested_items.description: The type of the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: PercentProgress
nested_items.description: The percentage of the estimated data that has been transferred.

nested_items.name: StorageEncrypted
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the DB cluster snapshot is encrypted.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: If StorageEncrypted is true, the Amazon Web Services KMS key identifier for the encrypted DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: DBClusterSnapshotArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: SourceDBClusterSnapshotArn
nested_items.description: If the DB cluster snapshot was copied from a source DB cluster snapshot, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the source DB cluster snapshot, otherwise, a null value.

nested_items.name: IAMDatabaseAuthenticationEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether mapping of Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) accounts to database accounts is enabled.

nested_items.name: TagList
nested_items.description: A list of tags.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: DBSystemId
nested_items.description: Reserved for future use.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: The storage type associated with the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: DbClusterResourceId
nested_items.description: The resource ID of the DB cluster that this DB cluster snapshot was created from.

nested_items.name: StorageThroughput
nested_items.description: The storage throughput for the DB cluster snapshot. The throughput is automatically set based on the IOPS that you provision, and is not configurable.
